attributes.action: Repeal the Act of Settlement (1700) and the Accession Declaration Act 1910.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition demands that the two acts mentioned in the title and the following links are repealed.

The Act of Settlement (1700) - http://www.legislation.gov.uk/aep/Will3/12-13/2/contents

The Accession Declaration Act 1910 - http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/Edw7and1Geo5/10/29/contents
attributes.background: The two acts that this petition demands to be revoked enforce religious discrimination in the succession to the monarchy; they require the monarch to be in communion with the Church of England.
